channel.title: Roatz Pkz | Need Some Beta Testers
channel.description:
[b][center]Hello as you guys know i did not finish my last roatz pkz remake project. But now i decided to restart. I had lost the original files so i decided to use OverloadX this time.
This project may or may not be hosted still not sure about it.. This will not be released to the community anytime soon.The reason for this is because roatzpkz is such a good server so i decided to remake for my own pleasure and purpose. Not for anyone else to use. I will be working on this a lone so i will have no issues with someone else taking/releasing without permission. This will not be updated regularly as i am hosting another server..
I have begun this project last night so there are minor things done like npc placement. I have not gotten to the combat just yet.
If you want to play and test the site is: *
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vHjg6Vc.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fdTeWIj.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7Ws2XLf.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SaFgYGt.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vm21YVP.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OQW63Qc.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/q1Khd5M.png[/img]
[img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/5880/um78.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OcSXoyz.png[/img]
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/3945/o0h9.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/O3y5989.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oTMEUoG.png[/img]
[img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/3303/59ka.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/dWMKB9X.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ryzKEeu.png[/img]
[img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/534/wr6v.png[/img]
[img]http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/8-31-2013/guoeb1.gif[/img]
[img]http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/8-31-2013/5l8ZWq.gif[/img]
I know the video sucks but i put this together in like 5 minutes. It is just to show my combat. And the lag caused my fail at switching. In game the switching is absolutely flawless
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yokw_TtfvNI[/youtube]
[/center]
